name: Bulldoze! Schneeraumer im Kampf
overview: A Tron\Worm variant. The object of this is to make the other bulldozer crash either into your trail or a wall. Published in Homecomputer 1984/04. The game consists of 6 rounds, the game will come to a draw if the players bump directly into each other. Each round will have a slightly modified screen to make things interesting.
